abstract: Helen T Verongos reviews movie The David Dance, directed by Aprill Winney and starring Don Scime.

headline.main: Review: In ‘The David Dance,’ a Gay Man Sheds His Crippling Self-Doubt

snippet: Troubled by insecurity, the host of a radio show opens his heart to love, and slowly begins to accept himself for who he is....
lead_paragraph: Troubled by insecurity, the host of a radio show opens his heart to love, and slowly begins to accept himself for who he is.
